title: How to set USE_OPENVB=ON and BUILD_CAFF2=ON when build from source
body_html:
my configuration:

ubuntu 16.04
cmake  3.5.1
python 2.7.12
opencv 3.3.1
pytorch HEAD:9b0cece9b024016fce946da994c440394eec4082

python setup.py install

gives:

-- ******** Summary ********
CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX  : /home/xx/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install<------how to change installation location?
BUILD_CAFFE2       : 0<------------------------caffe2 won't  be built? 
 BUILD_PYTHON      : 0<------------------------won't be built?
USE_CUDA              : 1<------------------------will be built or not?
CUDA version         : 9.0
cuDNN version         : 7.1.3
USE_EIGEN_FOR_BLAS    : <------------why no any of 0 or 1,or OFF or ON,what does this mean?
USE_FFMPEG            : OFF<--------------how to turn this on?I do have ffmpeg worked in this machine
USE_MKL                   : <----MKL do installed in this machine,what does this mean?
USE_OPENCV            : OFF<--------------how to turn this on?I do have opencv worked in this machine
USE_OPENMP            : OFF<------------how to turn this on?I do have openmp worked in this machine

How to solve these problems?

body:
my configuration:
```
ubuntu 16.04
cmake  3.5.1
python 2.7.12
opencv 3.3.1
pytorch HEAD:9b0cece9b024016fce946da994c440394eec4082
```

`python setup.py install`

gives:

```
-- ******** Summary ********
CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX  : /home/xx/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install<------how to change installation location?
BUILD_CAFFE2       : 0<------------------------caffe2 won't  be built? 
 BUILD_PYTHON      : 0<------------------------won't be built?
USE_CUDA              : 1<------------------------will be built or not?
CUDA version         : 9.0
cuDNN version         : 7.1.3
USE_EIGEN_FOR_BLAS    : <------------why no any of 0 or 1,or OFF or ON,what does this mean?
USE_FFMPEG            : OFF<--------------how to turn this on?I do have ffmpeg worked in this machine
USE_MKL                   : <----MKL do installed in this machine,what does this mean?
USE_OPENCV            : OFF<--------------how to turn this on?I do have opencv worked in this machine
USE_OPENMP            : OFF<------------how to turn this on?I do have openmp worked in this machine
```
How to solve these problems?
